mapper.select: SELECT SUM(IF(count_type = 2, count_value,0)) dayValue, SUM(IF(count_type = 3, count_value,0)) monthValue, SUM(IF(count_type = 4, count_value,0)) yearValue, area_id FROM area_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT('2020-11-05','%Y-%m-%d') AND (area_id = 1 OR area_id = 31) GROUP BY area_id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(count_time,"%h") AS dates, SUM(count_value) AS allValue, energy_id FROM area_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND (energy_id = #{energyId} OR #{energyId} = '' ) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h')
SELECT SUM(count_value) AS allValue, energy_id, count_type FROM area_data WHERE count_type = #{countType} GROUP BY energy_id

SELECT count_value,energy_id, (CASE WHEN count_type = 1 THEN DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%h') WHEN count_type = 2 THEN DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%d') WHEN count_type = 3 THEN DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%m') WHEN count_type = 4 THEN DATE_FORMAT(count_time,'%y') END) AS dates FROM area_data WHERE count_type = #{countType} AND area_id = #{areaId} GROUP BY energy_id
SELECT energy_id, sum(count_value) AS allValue FROM area_data WHERE count_type = #{countType} GROUP BY energy_id DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%Y") AS dates, sum(a.count_value) AS thisValue, sum(b.count_value) AS lastValue, ((sum(a.count_value)-sum(b.count_value))/abs(sum(b.count_value))*100) AS TB FROM area_data a RIGHT JOIN area_data b ON DATE_FORMAT(b.count_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(a.count_time,INTERVAL 1 YEAR),'%Y') WHERE a.area_id = #{areaId} and b.area_id = #{areaId} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') GROUP BY dates ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%Y")

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%m") AS dates, sum(a.count_value) AS thisValue, sum(b.count_value) AS lastValue, ((sum(a.count_value)-sum(b.count_value))/abs(sum(b.count_value))*100) AS TB FROM area_data a RIGHT JOIN area_data b ON DATE_FORMAT(b.count_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(a.count_time,INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') WHERE a.area_id = #{areaId} and b.area_id = #{areaId} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') GROUP BY dates ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%m")

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%m") AS dates, sum(a.count_value) AS thisValue, sum(b.count_value) AS lastValue, ((sum(a.count_value)-sum(b.count_value))/sum(b.count_value))*100 AS HB FROM area_data a RIGHT JOIN area_data b ON DATE_FORMAT(b.count_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(a.count_time,INTERVAL 1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') WHERE a.area_id = #{areaId} and b.area_id = #{areaId} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,'%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') GROUP BY dates ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%m")

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%m") AS months, DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%d") AS dates, sum(a.count_value) AS thisValue, sum(b.count_value) AS lastValue, ((sum(a.count_value)-sum(b.count_value))/sum(b.count_value))*100 AS HB FROM area_data a RIGHT JOIN area_data b ON DATE_FORMAT(b.count_time,'%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(a.count_time,INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%m') WHERE a.area_id = #{areaId} and b.area_id = #{areaId} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY months, dates ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%m"), DATE_FORMAT(a.count_time,"%d")
